meanings.definition: To place in the sky or heavens.
meanings.sent1: The kite was enskyed high above the park.
meanings.sent2: The stars were enskyed in the vast night sky.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was enskyed so high, it looked like a tiny dot.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were enskyed beyond the clouds, unreachable yet beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The bird was enskyed in flight, soaring gracefully among the clouds.

meanings.definition: To elevate to a higher position or status.
meanings.sent1: His hard work enskyed him to the position of manager.
meanings.sent2: The promotion enskyed her to a leadership role within the company.
meanings.sent3: The award enskyed him to celebrity status among his peers.
meanings.sent4: Her talent enskyed her above the competition, making her stand out.
meanings.sent5: The scholarship enskyed him to the ranks of esteemed scholars.
